00046 /*
00047  * Read the GRC file. First try reading it as a Calvin file
00048  * then as a GCOS GRC file.
00049  */
00050 bool FusionGrcFileReader::Read(const string &fileName, GridControlData& data)
00051 {
00052         GridControlFileReader calvinGrc;
00053         try
00054         {
00055                 calvinGrc.Read(fileName, data);
00056                 return true;
00057         }
00058         catch(InvalidFileTypeException e)
00059         {
00060                 CGRCFileData gcosGrc;
00061                 try
00062                 {
00063                         gcosGrc.SetFileName(fileName.c_str());
00064                         if (gcosGrc.Read(data) == true)
00065                                 return true;
00066                 }
00067                 catch(...)
00068                 {
00069                 }
00070         }
00071         catch (...)
00072         {
00073         }
00074         return  false;
00075 }
